abstract: Vegetarian fast-food, made street-side for four decades.
snippet: Vegetarian fast-food, made street-side for four decades.
lead_paragraph: Much has changed since the Bhagwan Sabaji Ram set up his vada pav stall in 1971 - there's a glittering new mall down the road, the textile mills that employed the cities' vast migrant population have closed down, and the Bandra-Worli link nearby gives evidence to the cities' global ambitions.

headline.main: Searching For the World's Best Vada Pav
